org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.context

Class JAContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.context.JAContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class JAContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Creates non-blocking, may-block and thread-bound mailboxes and serves as a thread pool for non-blocking and may-block mailboxes. Multiple mailbox factories with independent life cycles are also supported. In addition, the mailbox factory maintains a set of AutoClosable objects that are closed at the end-of-life of the mailbox factory as well as a set of properties.

        _threadFactory - The factory used to create threads for the threadpool.
